attacks.name: Hailstone
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Super Slash
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.name: Glalie

attacks.name: Wreck
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

attacks.name: Avalanche
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.

data.name: Glalie

attacks.name: Powder Snow
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: Move a Water Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.

data.name: Glalie

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Floe
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.flavorText: Legend says a boulder on an icy mountain absorbed the distress and regrets of a stranded mountaineer, giving rise to Glalie.

data.name: Glalie

abilities.name: Craggy Face
abilities.text: As long as Glalie is your Active Pokémon, any damage done by attacks from your opponent's Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Intimidation Pebble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Trainer cards or Supporter cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.

abilities.name: Synergy Effect
abilities.text: If Glacia's Stadium is in play, any damage done to Glalie by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Powder Snow
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Double-edge
attacks.text: Glalie does 10 damage to itself.

data.name: Glalie-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Ice Breath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Instant Freeze
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 100 more damage.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.text: Any damage done to Glalie by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon with any Special Energy cards attached to it is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Heavy Blizzard
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

data.name: M Glalie-EX
rules: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Cryo Mouth
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has 10 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 150 more damage.

data.name: Glalie

attacks.name: Ice Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed, and discard an Energy from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Frosty Typhoon
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Frosty Typhoon during your next turn.

data.flavorText: It freezes its prey and chews them whole. However, it prefers to eat Pokémon like Vanillite that are already frozen.

data.name: Glalie Spirit Link
rules: Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.
Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Glalie-EX.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Glalie-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Ice Breath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Instant Freeze
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 100 more damage.

data.name: M Glalie-EX
rules: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Cryo Mouth
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has 10 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 150 more damage.

data.name: Glalie

attacks.name: Big Mouth
attacks.text: If you played Candice from your hand during this turn, this attack does 130 more damage.

data.flavorText: It has a body of ice that won't melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.

data.name: Glalie

attacks.name: Damage Beat
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crazy Headbutt
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
